subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Although former Islanders’ captain Denis Potvin retired from the N.H.L. in 1988, Rangers fans have turned an off-color, derisive chant that invokes his name into an institution at Madison Square Garden.
snippet: Although former Islanders’ captain Denis Potvin retired from the N.H.L. in 1988, Rangers fans have turned an off-color, derisive chant that invokes his name into an institution at Madison Square Garden.
